      • fromJson

        <Result> RpcResponse<Result> fromJson(java.lang.String json,
                                      java.lang.Class<Result> resultClass)
        Deserialized a response from factomd or walletd into a proper RCP Response object with an appropriate result object as POJO.
        Type Parameters:
        Result - The target result type
        Parameters:
        json - The json response as String from factomd or walletd
        resultClass - The target result class for the response
        Returns:
        The RpcResponse

      • prettyPrint

        java.lang.String prettyPrint(java.lang.String json)
        Pretty prints the input JSON string if the Json Converter implementation supports it.
        Parameters:
        json - The json string to prettyprint
        Returns:
        The prettyprinted json string
